name: Virtual Aquarium
description:
This is an aquatic virtual ecosystem that I created by following through Dr. Joshua Fisher's Nature of Code (Unity Remix), originally written by Daniel Shiffman. The different creatures interact with each other and their environment in a lifelike way, done through code!

Check out the project GitHub: https://github.com/fatjosephina/nature-of-joe.

Check out Nature of Code (Unity Remix): https://natureofcodeunity.com/.

Credits

Programmer and Designer: Joseph Poselenzny

Source code derived from Joshua Fisher

Source code derived from Minions Art on Patreon

Consulting for Boid Logic: Brendan Lienau

Water Textures: Minions Art on Patreon
